description: A former Scrutiny President says an independent arbiter of public information requests is needed.
title: Guernsey needs Freedom of Information law with 'real authority'
title_page: Guernsey needs Freedom of Information law with 'real authority' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Green said: "It also should be headed up by a person with real authority, if they are going to strike down a decision of a States committee to withhold public information."
